added.title: Thread-safe external process tracking
added.description: Centralized external command invocation with Add-ExternalProcess / Remove-ExternalProcess helpers using monitor-based locking

added.title: Background worker lifecycle management
added.description: Monitor-protected registries with Add-BackgroundWorker / Remove-BackgroundWorker helpers for safe task tracking

added.title: Safe shutdown handler
added.description: FormClosing now snapshots workers and processes under locks, cancels background tasks, kills orphaned processes, disposes UI controls, and forces GC

added.title: Thread-safe logging with UI marshaling
added.description: Write-ToolkitLog (alias Log) ensures safe UI updates with InvokeRequired fallback and console fallback

added.title: Restored printer troubleshooting functions
added.description: Reintroduced Show-PrinterInventory and implemented Remove-GhostPrinters for offline/non-default printer removal

fixed.title: Section numbering conflict
fixed.description: LOG MANAGEMENT renumbered from Section 5 to Section 10 to avoid overlap with DISK AND STORAGE HEALTH

fixed.title: Hardcoded button container height
fixed.description: Replaced fixed height (5500) with dynamic sizing based on $yPosition after all controls are added

fixed.title: UI freezing during profile operations
fixed.description: Moved Teams cache clear, Outlook profile reset, and OneDrive sync fix to background tasks

fixed.title: Event handler parameter clarity
fixed.description: Standardized event handler parameter names to avoid automatic-variable assignment issues ($sender → $frmSender, etc.)

fixed.title: Progress bar null reference errors
fixed.description: Added guarding to avoid null reference errors when accessing progress bar

changed.title: Hardened Start-BackgroundTask
changed.description: Added validation, safe event wiring, start-then-register semantics, and Register-ObjectEvent fallback

changed.title: Long-running operations moved to background
changed.description: Battery Report, CHKDSK, and other heavy tasks now run in background workers

notes: Parser validation completed: PARSE_OK. Remaining PSScriptAnalyzer style suggestions are recommended follow-ups.

added.title: Thread-safe logging system
added.description: Full thread-safe logging with color-coded status (PASS/WARN/FAIL) and console fallback

added.title: Background task engine
added.description: System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker with lifecycle tracking for all long-running operations

added.title: Safe external process execution
added.description: Invoke-ExternalCommand captures exit code, stdout/stderr with automatic cleanup

added.title: DPI awareness
added.description: High-resolution display support for better visual clarity

added.title: Auto-elevation to Administrator
added.description: Automatic elevation with preserved script path on startup

added.title: Form closing handler
added.description: Graceful shutdown that cancels background tasks and kills orphaned processes

added.title: Confirmation prompts
added.description: Destructive actions now require user confirmation (e.g., Outlook reset)

added.title: Status bar
added.description: Shows PC name, user, domain, and admin status at bottom of window

enhanced.title: Background operation support
enhanced.description: All long-running operations (SFC, DISM, CHKDSK, Battery Report) run in background

enhanced.title: Robust error handling
enhanced.description: Enhanced error handling in every diagnostic function with detailed reporting

enhanced.title: Modern dark-themed UI
enhanced.description: Dark theme with hover effects and consistent styling throughout

enhanced.title: Improved tooltips
enhanced.description: 8-second auto-pop delay for better usability and reduced annoyance

notes: Modular architecture with reusable functions (New-ToolkitButton, Show-Confirmation, etc.). Fallback event registration using Register-ObjectEvent for compatibility.
